Message:
Led by Leader Lucille,
I was taken to a particular church.

There, a lone nun was
caring for a group of orphans...
Both witches and humans alike,
without prejudice...

The ones leading the orphans
were Leader Lucille and Nebra.
The two did everything together.

But, since Nebra was always
saying that witches and humans
could one day live in harmony,
I struggled to get along with her...

As we spent more time
together, though,
I did start to open my eyes
to her way of thinking a little...

Until the day the nun
was killed, that is.

It was the same as what
happened to Mom and Dad.
All because that nun thought
witches and humans could
somehow live side by side...!

After that, the children of
the orphanage broke apart.

They split into two groups—
witches and humans—
with both doing
everything separately...

I guess witches and humans
can’t live together after all.
Then...
